info_content:
You can only see this message and not the embed?
Then read this https://docs.emojiguardian.xyz/troubleshooting
content:
You can only see the dropdown and the buttons?
Then read this https://docs.emojiguardian.xyz/troubleshooting

fields.name: {emoji_bot}Σχετικά με το Emoji Guardian
fields.value:
> Emoji Guardian is a bot especially for emoji servers.
> With the Bot, you can do a lot with emojis like locking an emoji to a role and much more.

fields.name: {emoji_tools}How can I see the commands?
fields.value: > Click under the buttons on the select menu and select a command category.

fields.name: {emoji_support}How can I get support?
fields.value: > You can join [support server](https://discord.gg/EbBsuxVNYT) or you can DM `Lost Paul#3453` or `Danu#4422`

fields.name: {emoji_translate}How can I change the language of the bot?
fields.value:
> You can change the language of the bot by using the command {languageSet}
> Your language isn't there? Then you can start translating it at https://translate.emojiguardian.xyz/

options.label: Single emoji commands
options.description: Commands which work with only one emoji

options.label: Commands that work multiple emojis
options.description: Command which work with more than one emoji

options.label: Blacklist/Other commands
options.description: Blacklist commands and other commands than single and multiple emojis commands

mention:
Hey {user_mention}, the bot only works with slash commands, click on {help} to get started.
Change the language of the bot to your preferred language with {languageSet}!
Learn more about slash commands at <https://emojiguardian.xyz/slash>
